text: Ellice is a former provincial electoral division in the Canadian province of Manitoba. It was created by redistribution in 1979 and eliminated in 1989. The riding was located in west-central Winnipeg, in the area of the future Minto and St. James ridings. ==List of provincial representatives== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Name ! Party ! Took Office ! Left Office |- bgcolor=#FFE1C4 | Brian Corrin | NDP | 1981 | 1986 |- bgcolor=#FFE1C4 | Harvey Smith | NDP | 1986 | 1988 |- bgcolor=#FFE8E8 | Avis Gray | Lib | 1988 | 1990 |} ==Election results== ==References== Category:Defunct Manitoba provincial electoral districts
title: Ellice (electoral district)
